They are rarely found in leadership positions and often live Planetouched is a general word to describe someone who can as loners due to their absolute dedication to goodness. Others are trace his or her bloodline back to an outsider, usually a fiend or less fanatical and fit seamlessly into normal human society. celestial. The effects of having a supernatural being in one’s heritage last Combat for many generations. Although not as dramatically altered as a Aasimars usually like a fair, straightforward contest. Against a par- half-celestial or a half-fiend, planetouched still retain some special ticularly evil foe, however, they fight with utter conviction and to qualities. the death. The two planetouched varieties described here are the most Daylight (Sp): An aasimar can use daylight once per day as a 1st- common. Aasimars are humans with some trace of celestial blood level caster or a caster of his class levels, whichever is higher. in their veins, and tieflings have some fiendishness in their family Skills: An aasimar has a +2 racial bonus on Spot and Listen tree. checks. There is no “typical” aasimar or tiefling. They do not have their own societies or cultures, instead blending into existing ones. The aasimar warrior presented here had the following ability Many have character classes. scores before racial adjustments: Str 13, Dex 11, Con 12, Int 10, Wis 9, Cha 8.
